title: ollama/ollama
summary: Ollama’s official CLI and server for running Llama 2, Mistral, Gemma and other LLMs locally with one command.

title: ollama-python
summary: Official Python client for Ollama; chat, embed, pull and manage local models with a few lines of code.

title: ollama-js
summary: Official JavaScript/TypeScript client for Node and browsers; same surface as the Python SDK.

title: langchain-ollama
summary: LangChain integration package letting you use any Ollama model as an LLM or embeddings provider.

title: ollama-webui
summary: Feature-rich web UI (predecessor to Open WebUI) for chatting with Ollama models; markdown, code highlighting, multi-user.

title: open-webui
summary: Community continuation of ollama-webui; adds RAG, plugin store, voice input, admin panel.

title: ollama-cli
summary: Interactive TUI for Ollama written in Go; browse, chat and manage models from the terminal.

title: ollama-copilot
summary: GitHub-Copilot-like VS-Code extension that uses Ollama models for inline suggestions and chat.

title: ollama4j
summary: Java/Kotlin client for Ollama; fluent API, streaming, embeddings and tool calls.

title: ollama-rag
summary: Minimal RAG template using Ollama embeddings + Chroma + Streamlit to chat with local PDFs.

title: ollama-chatbot
summary: Lightweight Next.js chatbot example that streams answers from an Ollama backend.

title: ollama-haystack
summary: Haystack integration providing OllamaGenerator and OllamaEmbedder nodes for pipelines.

title: ollama-chem
summary: Specialized Modelfile and scripts to create a local chemistry-aware LLM via Ollama.

title: ollama-discord
summary: Self-hosted Discord bot that brings Ollama models into any server with slash commands.

title: ollama-helm
summary: Official Helm chart for deploying Ollama on Kubernetes with GPU autoscaling.

title: ollama-nim
summary: Nim client library for Ollama; statically linked binaries for tiny deployments.

title: ollama-csharp
summary: .NET 8 client for Ollama with Blazor demo; supports chat, embeddings and model management.

title: ollama-rust
summary: Rust crate providing strongly-typed async bindings to the Ollama API.

title: ollama-dagger
summary: Dagger module that caches and serves Ollama models inside CI pipelines for offline LLM tests.

title: ollama-slack
summary: Slack Bolt app that adds /ollama slash command for private or channel-local LLM chats.
